ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: You need to use 1 water and 2 metal bits making sure they are separated in the forge
ygData.messageBody:
You need to use 1 water and 2 metal bits making sure they are separated in
the forge

> -----Original Message-----
> From: bigfoot [SMTP:bigfoot@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 11, 1999 11:15 PM
> To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_SMITHS] (no subject)
>
> From: bigfoot <bigfoot@...>
>
> I was trying to make metal bits today, i used 1 water and 1 small ore
> piece, nothing happened. Can someone tell me why? The message said that
> the quatities were in correct and that the things didnt combine
>
>
> PLEASE HELP
> My blacksmithing skill is 15, when i tried to train in it more it said I
> need to practice advanced skills or something (it was in red)
> Thanks
> Tudan
>
>
>
